subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ offense came to life against the Reds, putting San Francisco one win away from becoming the first team to erase a 2-0 deficit in a best-of-five series by winning three straight on the road.
snippet: The Giants’ offense came to life against the Reds, putting San Francisco one win away from becoming the first team to erase a 2-0 deficit in a best-of-five series by winning three straight on the road.
